verses.verse: Let not your<WG5216> heart<WG2588> be troubled:<WG5015> you believe<WG4100> in God,<WG2316> believe<WG4100> also<WG2532> in me.
In my Father's<WG3962> house<WG3614> are many<WG4183> mansions:<WG3438> if <WG1490> it were not so, I would have told<WG2036> you. I go<WG4198> to prepare<WG2090> a place<WG5117> for you.

And if<WG1437> I go<WG4198> and prepare<WG2090> a place<WG5117> for you, I will come<WG2064> again,<WG3825> and receive<WG3880> you to myself;<WG1683> that where<WG3699> I am, <WG1510> there you may be also. <WG2532>
And where<WG3699> I go<WG5217> you know,<WG1492> and the way<WG3598> you know. <WG1492>
Thomas<WG2381> said<WG3004> to him, Lord,<WG2962> we know<WG1492> not where<WG4226> you go;<WG5217> and how<WG4459> can<WG1410> we know the way?<WG3598>
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to him, I am<WG1510> the way,<WG3598> the truth,<WG225> and the life:<WG2222> no<WG3762> man<WG3762> comes<WG2064> to the Father,<WG3962> but by me.
If<WG1487> you had known<WG1097> me, you should have known<WG1097> my Father<WG3962> also:<WG2532> and from now on<WG737> you know<WG1097> him, and have seen<WG3708> him.
Philip<WG5376> said<WG3004> to him, Lord,<WG2962> show<WG1166> us the Father,<WG3962> and it suffises<WG714> us.

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to him, Have I been<WG1510> so<WG5118> long<WG5118> time<WG5550> with you, and yet have you not known<WG1097> me, Philip?<WG5376> he that has seen<WG3708> me has seen<WG3708> the Father;<WG3962> and how<WG4459> say<WG3004> you then, Show<WG1166> us the Father? <WG3962>

Believe<WG4100> you not that I am in the Father,<WG3962> and the Father<WG3962> in me? the words<WG4487> that I speak<WG2980> to you I speak<WG2980> not of myself:<WG1683> but the Father<WG3962> that dwells<WG3306> in me, he does<WG4160> the works. <WG2041>
Believe<WG4100> me that I am in the Father,<WG3962> and the Father<WG3962> in me: or<WG1161> else<WG1490> believe<WG4100> me for the very works'<WG2041> sake.

Truly,<WG281> truly,<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, He that believes<WG4100> on<WG1519> me, the works<WG2041> that I do<WG4160> shall he do<WG4160> also;<WG2548> and greater<WG3187> works<WG2041> than these<WG5130> shall he do;<WG4160> because<WG3754> I go<WG4198> to my Father. <WG3962>
And whatever <WG3748> <WG302> you shall ask<WG154> in my name,<WG3686> that will I do,<WG4160> that the Father<WG3962> may be glorified<WG1392> in the Son. <WG5207>
If<WG1437> you shall ask<WG154> any<WG5100> thing in my name,<WG3686> I will do <WG4160> it.
If<WG1437> you love<WG25> me, keep<WG5083> my commandments. <WG1785>
And I will pray<WG2065> the Father,<WG3962> and he shall give<WG1325> you another<WG243> Comforter,<WG3875> that he may abide<WG3306> with you for ever; <WG165>

Even the Spirit<WG4151> of truth;<WG225> whom<WG3739> the world<WG2889> cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> receive,<WG2983> because<WG3754> it sees<WG2334> him not, neither<WG3761> knows<WG1097> him: but you know<WG1492> him; for he dwells<WG3306> with you, and shall be in you.
I will not leave<WG863> you comfortless:<WG3737> I will come<WG2064> to you.
Yet<WG2089> a little<WG3397> while, and the world<WG2889> sees<WG2334> me no<WG3765> more;<WG2089> but you see<WG2334> me: because<WG3754> I live,<WG2198> you shall live<WG2198> also. <WG2532>
At<WG1722> that day<WG2250> you shall know<WG1097> that I am in my Father,<WG3962> and you in me, and I in you.

He that has<WG2192> my commandments,<WG1785> and keeps<WG5083> them, he it is that loves<WG25> me: and he that loves<WG25> me shall be loved<WG25> of my Father,<WG3962> and I will love<WG25> him, and will manifest<WG1718> myself<WG1683> to him.
Judas<WG2455> said<WG3004> to him, not Iscariot,<WG2469> Lord,<WG2962> how<WG5101> is it that you will manifest<WG1718> yourself<WG4572> to us, and not to the world?<WG2889>

Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to him, If<WG1437> a man<WG5100> love<WG25> me, he will keep<WG5083> my words:<WG3056> and my Father<WG3962> will love<WG25> him, and we will come<WG2064> to him, and make<WG4160> our stayed<WG3438> with him.
He that loves<WG25> me not keeps<WG5083> not my sayings:<WG3056> and the word<WG3056> which<WG3739> you hear<WG191> is not mine,<WG1699> but the Father's<WG3962> which<WG3588> sent<WG3992> me.
These<WG5023> things have I spoken<WG2980> to you, being yet present<WG3306> with you.

But the Comforter, <WG3875> which is the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> whom<WG3739> the Father<WG3962> will send<WG3992> in my name,<WG3686> he shall teach<WG1321> you all<WG3956> things, and bring<WG5279> all<WG3956> things to your<WG5209> remembrance,<WG5279> whatever<WG3739> I have said<WG2036> to you.

Peace<WG1515> I leave<WG863> with you, my peace<WG1515> I give<WG1325> to you: not as the world<WG2889> gives,<WG1325> give<WG1325> I to you. Let not your<WG5216> heart<WG2588> be troubled,<WG5015> neither<WG3366> let it be afraid. <WG1168>

You have heard<WG191> how<WG3754> I said<WG2036> to you, I go<WG5217> away,<WG5217> and come <WG2064> again to you. If<WG1487> you loved<WG25> me, you would rejoice,<WG5463> because<WG3754> I said,<WG2036> I go<WG4198> to the Father:<WG3962> for my Father<WG3962> is greater<WG3187> than I.
And now<WG3568> I have told<WG2046> you before<WG4250> it come<WG1096> to pass, that, when<WG3752> it is come<WG1096> to pass, you might believe. <WG4100>
Hereafter<WG2089> I will not talk<WG2980> much<WG4183> with you: for the prince<WG758> of this<WG3588> world<WG2889> comes,<WG2064> and has<WG2192> nothing<WG3762> in me.

But that the world<WG2889> may know<WG1097> that I love<WG25> the Father;<WG3962> and as the Father<WG3962> gave<WG1781> me commandment,<WG1781> even so<WG3779> I do.<WG4160> Arise,<WG1453> let us go<WG71> hence. <WG1782>
